about.about_me_desc: I am a motivated Front-End Developer with strong knowledge of HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, and hands-on experience using Angular to build responsive, user-friendly web applications. I have a solid understanding of object-oriented programming, web services (REST, JSON), and version control tools like Git. Passionate about clean code, continuous learning, and contributing to agile development teams.

experience.education_1_title: Faculty of (Information System & Computer Science), (October 6) University
experience.education_1_degree: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science department
experience.experience_1_title: Digital Egypt Pioneers Initiative (DEPI) - Angular Frontend
experience.experience_1_desc_1: Built dynamic Angular interfaces with reusable components, improved app performance and responsiveness across devices.
experience.experience_1_desc_2: Supported team projects by applying modern frontend practices.
experience.experience_2_title: NTI - National Telecommunication Institute MEAN Stack Web Development
experience.experience_2_desc: Trained on MongoDB, Express, Angular, and Node.js with focus on building responsive frontend apps.
experience.experience_3_desc: Gained practical skills in Angular development and modern frontend practices.
